description: Rescued by the ski patrol, Justin Jameson invites Jude Collin and Vinnie D'Angelo home. The roaring fire emboldens this manly trio to strip down for some furious suck'n'fuck action. Justin knows how to thank Jude and Vinnie - his mouth, tongue and ass doing all the talking. And his two saviors' stiff monster cocks respond in kind.
title: Winter Heat, Scene #04
